name: me.hoshino.novpndetect

releases.name: v1.1
releases.description:
Better **NetworkInterface** name spoofing
Prevent **NetworkInfo** getType detect

releases.name: v1.0
releases.description: First version, some apps may bypass the prevent
releases.descriptionHTML: First version, some apps may bypass the prevent

readme:
# NoVPNDetect
A Xposed module prevent some apps detect your phone connected to VPN.

# Usage
 - Download & activate this module
 - Select app that you want to prevent detect VPN
 - Reboot phone or relaunch app
